name: Frightened knight
description:
Your horse is out of control! It thinks it's a chess-like knight. But that's not the worst thing. It somehow got frightened and cannot be stopped. You can just pick direction but be quick. When you don't pick, the horse will continue in the same direction. Expect nothing less than real chess rodeo! 

This is a nice little puzzle game where the main mechanics is to hop like a knight and your goal is to pick up a treasure chest.

Rules
  •  horse hops to the next tile within 3 seconds, when you start horse cannot be stopped
  • horse moves like a knight in chess game
  • get a treasure chest and don't get killed
Tools & credits

Made in Godot engine.

I have used external visuals and music (when I find  sources and I'll write links here:) 

Sounds were made in bfxr.
All the coding was made by myself in about a day and half.

Have fun!
